resources.string: You are not connected to a device

The Chariot Gauge controller is now for sale! 

 Please visit: https://www.chariotgauge.com/ 


Feb-21-2015: 
 -Fixed gauge display for lollipop. 


June-1-2014: 
 -Added charting/datalogging. 
 -Added BAR units to pressure gauges. 
 -Fixed random error when disconnecting. 
 -Fixed gauge resolution. 
 -Fixed text fill on tablets. 


May-06-2014: 
 -Fixed data parse error. 
 -Fixed disconnect error. 
 -Known error with Galaxy S3 when disconnecting. 


Mar-14-2014: 
 -Fixed error when disconnecting. 
 -Updated max-reset functionality. 
 -Updated logo. 
 -Updated title bar. 
 -Fixed border on single gauge view. 


Oct-27-2013: 
 - Added landscape layout for two gauge view. 
 - Added voltmeter support. 
 - Better background processing. 
 - Added vacuum 
 - Updated tablet support. 


Aug-26-2013: 
 - Added gauge resolution setting. 
 - Fixed small bugs. 


Jun-23-2013: 
 - Fixed multi-threading issue. 


Jun-16-2013: 
 - Better background data processing. 


Mar-30-2013: 
 - Added two gauge display and config. 
 - Added four gauge display. 


Mar-17-2013: 
 - Fixed Nexus 7 layout bug 


Dec-5-2012: 
 - Moved firmware to 10 bit support 


Nov-11-2012: 
 - Fixed force close when passing BT object between views while connecting 


Oct-5-2012: 
 - Initial release
